医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
Nidus-Family Care软件包降低了痴呆症支持成本NIDUS家庭护理包装使用目标设定来帮助痴呆症患者在家中寿命更长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/nidus-family-care-package-reduces-duces-dementia-support-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/nidus-family-care-package-reduces-duces-dementia-support-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AEA3C2FB-F040-4973-A037-A037-0B5EC39D6D6EAF Mon, 17 Feb 2025 21:05:19 -0500 NIDUS-Family care package reduces dementia support costs
蠕动泵送运动可触发淀粉样蛋白形成大阪大学的研究人员发现，蠕动泵的作用和高剪切动力会促进淀粉样蛋白成核。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/peristaltic-pumping-motion-found-found-to-trigger-trigger-amyloid-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/peristaltic-pumping-motion-found-found-to-trigger-trigger-amyloid-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=680E010A-665F-4D43-87E4-7C434EC72CDC Mon, 17 Feb 2025 20:59:58 -0500 Peristaltic pumping motion found to trigger amyloid formation
全球报告强调需要更好地使用医用氧气根据新的全球报告，通用通用通道，国家路线图和更实惠和可访问的护理目标对于填补影响世界一半以上人口的医疗氧气差距至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/global-report-highlights-the--need-for-better-better-access-to-to-medical-oxygen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/global-report-highlights-the--need-for-better-better-access-to-to-medical-oxygen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29E7DA51-1B95-4135-4135-AD39-09885C40F083 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 20:52:00 -0500 Global report highlights the need for better access to medical oxygen
内部时钟会影响肥胖青少年的饮食习惯研究人员发现，当天晚些时候，肥胖症的青少年比健康体重的同龄人更多，而且他们的饮食行为受到内部身体时钟的强烈影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/internal-body-clods-influences-ieat-habits-habits-obese-obese-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/internal-body-clods-influences-ieat-habits-habits-obese-obese-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=631C8458-67FE-416C-AEE5-C2BE59351E16 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 20:44:00 -0500 Internal body clock influences eating habits of obese teens
妊娠并发症后，不到20％的女性因心血管风险而受到筛查根据妊娠相关的高血压或糖尿病后，少于五分之一的患者接受了心血管危险因素的测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/fewer-than-2025-of-women-screenced-for-cardiescular cardiescular-cardiescular-cardist-frisk-ferfter-ferfter-ferfer-fefter-fefter-pregence-complemications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/fewer-than-2025-of-women-screenced-for-cardiescular-cardiescular-fors-fter-fefter-ferfter-ferfer-ferfer-fefter-fefter-pregence-complemications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a38fb4c-7069-4f3a-4f3a-a33c-1114b2745457 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 20:40:24 -0500 Fewer than 20% of women screened for cardiovascular risk after pregnancy complications
人工智能以82％的精度预测早产风险研究人员使用机器学习模型来预测早产风险，将线性SVM识别为最准确的，其中包括炎症和血液组成标记在内的关键预测因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/ai-predicts-predicts-preterm-birth-risk-with-8225-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/ai-predicts-predicts-preterm-birth-risk-with-8225-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65Da0dcf-7b6f-4b47b47b47b4db-98db-98d31b11e8d1 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 20:32:00 -0500 AI predicts preterm birth risk with 82% accuracy
西班牙罕见的肠病毒菌株引起了潜在暴发的警报西班牙的科学家检测到肠病毒C105（EV-C105），这是一种与儿童呼吸道和可能的神经系统疾病有关的罕见病毒，突出了遗传上不同病毒株的出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/rare-enterovirus-strain-in-strain-in-pain-npain-raises-alarms-alarms-oalarms-over-over-potential爆发appxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/rare-enterovirus-strain-in-strain-in-pain-npain-spain-rasis-alarms-alrarms-olarms-over-potential expreast.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba064e20-EA37-48F9-B811-61D575530606 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 20:09:00 -0500 Rare enterovirus strain in Spain raises alarms over potential outbreaks
Lecanemab和Donanemab慢慢降低了阿尔茨海默氏症的衰落，但收益值得？研究发现，阿尔茨海默氏症，lecanemab和Donanemab的疾病改良疗法可以将日常活动的独立性扩大长达13个月，尽管他们的临床相关性仍在争论中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/lecanemab-and-donanemab-slow-aslow-alzheimere28099s-decline-decline-but-is-the-benefit-worth-worth-the-cost.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/lecanemab-and-donanemab-slow-aslow-alzheimere28099s-decline-decline-but-is-the-benefit-benefit-worth-worth-worth-the-cost.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35D3A7E9-58BD-405B-405B-A291-0F81BD50913D Mon, 17 Feb 2025 17:12:00 -0500 Lecanemab and donanemab slow Alzheimer’s decline, but is the benefit worth the cost?
糖尿病燃料抗生素耐药性，感染恶化和治疗挑战一项新的研究表明，糖尿病显着加速了抗抗生素抗生素金黄色葡萄球菌感染的出现和传播，突显了主要的公共健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/diabetes-fuels-fuels-antabiotic-resistance-worsenance-worsening-infections-infections-ing-woreatment-wareatment-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/diabetes-fuels-fuels-antabiotic-resistance-worsening-worsening-infections-infections-ingenfions-and-treatment-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AC20E230-B7FE-40F5-8767-C477EE24FB015 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 17:00:00 -0500 Diabetes fuels antibiotic resistance, worsening infections and treatment challenges
慢性压力会恢复大脑，钝声感知重复的压力会破坏听觉处理，使声音随着时间的流逝显得安静，如一项对小鼠的新研究所示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/chronic-stress-rewires-the-brain-dulling-sound-ception.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/chronic-stress-rewires-the-brain-dulling-sound-poception.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=878e1a7f-6abd-44a1-b86a-d4e32f9942f6 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 15:09:00 -0500 Chronic stress rewires the brain, dulling sound perception
